TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: Objeto en que está asociado el controlador de eventos.

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará los eventos enrutados y , así como los eventos adjuntos y los eventos de vista previa relacionados.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este delegado se utiliza con los siguientes eventos adjuntos:This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - Este delegado también se utiliza con los siguientes eventos enrutados en los elementos base.This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. Estos eventos enrutados reenvían los eventos adjuntos enumerados anteriormente para hacerlos más accesible para el modelo de elemento general en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - Los eventos adjuntos y los eventos de elemento base enrutado comparten sus datos de evento, y las versiones de los eventos enrutados de túnel y propagación también comparten datos del evento.The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. Esto puede afectar a las características controladas del evento cuando recorre la ruta del evento.This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. Para obtener más información, consulte [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). Si el eventos o la evento está controlado ( está establecido en `true` en los datos del evento), no se cambiará el foco del teclado.If the event or the event is handled ( is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
